It's totally okay."},{"lineNumber":118660,"originalJapaneseLine":"　抱かせてくれるならなんでもオーケ」","translatedEnglishLine":"As long as you'll hold me, anything's okay."},{"lineNumber":118661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは良かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's good to hear."},{"lineNumber":118662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では……今この時だけは……","translatedEnglishLine":"Then... just for this moment..."},{"lineNumber":118663,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の体はランス様のものです」","translatedEnglishLine":"My body is Lord Rance's."},{"lineNumber":118664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うひうひ、いーねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heh heh, that's good."},{"lineNumber":118665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But..."},{"lineNumber":118666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm?"},{"lineNumber":118667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この身を貴方に捧げることは構いません」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't mind giving my body to you,"},{"lineNumber":118668,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですが……心はいつもあの方のもの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but... my heart will always belong to that person..."},{"lineNumber":118669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このような女を抱いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Holding a woman like this,"},{"lineNumber":118670,"originalJapaneseLine":"　楽しいものかは保証致しかねますよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't guarantee that it'll be enjoyable, you know?"},{"lineNumber":118671,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おー、そんなんどうだっていい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, that kind of thing doesn't matter."},{"lineNumber":118672,"originalJapaneseLine":"　抱けるならなんだっていいのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"As long as I can hold her, anything is fine."},{"lineNumber":118673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Well..."},{"lineNumber":118674,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様は本当に男らしいお方」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance really is a manly man."},{"lineNumber":118675,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then..."},{"lineNumber":118676,"originalJapaneseLine":"しゅるり。","translatedEnglishLine":"(Sound of slipping off)"},{"lineNumber":118677,"originalJapaneseLine":"シャロンがメイド服を脱ぐ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sharon takes off her maid outfit."},{"lineNumber":118678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh!"},{"lineNumber":118679,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて、始めましょうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, shall we begin..."},{"lineNumber":118680,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":118681,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":118682,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……ご満足頂けました？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Phew... were you satisfied?"},{"lineNumber":118683,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君……上手いなぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're... really good..."},{"lineNumber":118684,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……長生きですから」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well... I've lived a long time, after all."},{"lineNumber":118685,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんか……君、怖いな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow... you scare me..."},{"lineNumber":118686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、女の子になんてことを……","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh my, doing such things to a girl..."},{"lineNumber":118687,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様は本当にひどいお方」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance truly is a terrible person."},{"lineNumber":118688,"originalJapaneseLine":"「思うことはありますが……","translatedEnglishLine":"There are things I think about, but..."},{"lineNumber":118689,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メイドとしての仕事を致します」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will do my job as a maid."},{"lineNumber":118690,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よう、君は確か……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, you are surely..."},{"lineNumber":118691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「エルシールです、ランス総統」","translatedEnglishLine":"Elshil, sir Rance."},{"lineNumber":118692,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは廊下でエルシールとバッタリ会った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance suddenly met Elshil in the hallway."},{"lineNumber":118693,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その大量の荷物……","translatedEnglishLine":"That huge amount of luggage..."},{"lineNumber":118694,"originalJapaneseLine":"　洗濯物か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it laundry?"},{"lineNumber":118695,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、ビスケッタさんのお手伝いを少し。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, I'm helping Biscetta a bit."},{"lineNumber":118696,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ飯食らいにはなりたくないもの」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't want to be a freeloader."},{"lineNumber":118697,"originalJapaneseLine":"「案外、話が分かるな。","translatedEnglishLine":"You're surprisingly reasonable."},{"lineNumber":118698,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺に対して恨みはないのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't you hold a grudge against me?"},{"lineNumber":118699,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったくない、と言えば嘘ね……","translatedEnglishLine":"It would be a lie to say I don't have any at all..."},{"lineNumber":118700,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵同士で戦っていたわけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"We were enemies in battle,"},{"lineNumber":118701,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こうなることも覚悟はありましたが……","translatedEnglishLine":"so I was prepared for this outcome..."},{"lineNumber":118702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やはり、共にいた時間が長かった分、","translatedEnglishLine":"Still, since we spent so much time together,"},{"lineNumber":118703,"originalJapaneseLine":"　失った衝撃は……","translatedEnglishLine":"the shock of losing you is..."},{"lineNumber":118704,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":118705,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一応、まだ魔血魂状態で","translatedEnglishLine":"For now, you're still in the demon blood soul state,"},{"lineNumber":118706,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当に死んだわけではないから、","translatedEnglishLine":"so you're not really dead,"},{"lineNumber":118707,"originalJapaneseLine":"　冷静でいられるだけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"which is why I can stay calm."},{"lineNumber":118708,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これで本当に死んだら……","translatedEnglishLine":"If you really died now..."},{"lineNumber":118709,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分含めて、皆どうなるか分からない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know what would become of everyone, including myself."},{"lineNumber":118710,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん、そんなもんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, is that so?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと別となりましょうが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will surely be something different, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのような心配は無用です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you don't need to worry about that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに……貴方に媚びを売っておけば、
ケッセルリンク様の復活、
早めて下さるかも知れませんでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: might be accelerated, don't you think?
No, not at all. It's totally okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抱かせてくれるならなんでもオーケ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As long as you'll hold me, anything's okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の体はランス様のものです」
「この身を貴方に捧げることは構いません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't mind giving my body to you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが……心はいつもあの方のもの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but... my heart will always belong to that person...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽しいものかは保証致しかねますよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't guarantee that it'll be enjoyable, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おー、そんなんどうだっていい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, that kind of thing doesn't matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抱けるならなんだっていいのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As long as I can hold her, anything is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様は本当に男らしいお方」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance really is a manly man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャロンがメイド服を脱ぐ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sharon takes off her maid outfit.
Well... I've lived a long time, after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、女の子になんてことを……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh my, doing such things to a girl...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様は本当にひどいお方」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance truly is a terrible person.
There are things I think about, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイドとしての仕事を致します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will do my job as a maid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エルシールです、ランス総統」
ランスは廊下でエルシールとバッタリ会った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance suddenly met Elshil in the hallway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、ビスケッタさんのお手伝いを少し。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, I'm helping Biscetta a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ飯食らいにはなりたくないもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want to be a freeloader.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺に対して恨みはないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't you hold a grudge against me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったくない、と言えば嘘ね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would be a lie to say I don't have any at all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵同士で戦っていたわけで、
こうなることも覚悟はありましたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I was prepared for this outcome...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、共にいた時間が長かった分、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, since we spent so much time together,
the shock of losing you is...
For now, you're still in the demon blood soul state,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に死んだわけではないから、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which is why I can stay calm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分含めて、皆どうなるか分からない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know what would become of everyone, including myself.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
